messages.1000086408:
Rage starts building up when attained, and gives damage equal to max Physical ATK at a certain chance.
Strength increases for #y{0}#w sec following own HP when hit by enemies and rage accumulation speed increases.
#yHit when HP is {1}%: rage accumulated every {2} sec
Hit when HP is {3}%: STR +{4}%, rage accumulated every {5} sec
Hit when HP is {6}%: STR +{7}%, rage accumulated every {8} sec 
Hit when HP is {9}%: STR +{10}% when hit, rage accumulated every {11} sec, duration {12} sec
Trigger Rate: {13}%
Cooldown {14} sec
#wWhen Taunting Howl is used,  #y{15}#w Rage Points are used to activate enhanced Circle Swing. When enhanced Circle Swing is used, the activated effect is removed.
[Enhanced Circle Swing]
#yCircle Swing ATK's {16}%

messages.1000094564:
Jumps to slam and break the bones of the target in front so that additional damage will be applied on all the future attacks. Part of the character's Strength will be changed to Physical Attack Power for a certain period of time.
#yATK: {0}%
Damage per hit: +{1}
{2}% of STR is converted to ATK
Broken bones last for: {3} sec
Additional ATK duration: {4} sec
{5} Rage Points are added when Bone Crash is used.
messages.1000093735:
When Demolition Fist is hit, a slamming attack that uses the momentum is added.
#yAdditional hit ATK (Demolition Fist's {0}%)
Stun chance increased by {1}%

messages.1000085159:
After Circle Swing is used, enter Normal Attack button to launch enemies into the air.
#yAdditional hit ATK (Circle Swing's {0}%)

#yEnhanced additional hit ATK ({1}% of Circle Swing EX's additional hit)
{2} Rage points are added when Taunting Howl is used.
messages.1000072324: Whirlwind's attack area is increased and more are hit.\n#yWhirlwind's ATK: +{0}%
messages.1000065701:
When #y[Battle Howl/Taunting Howl/Havoc Howl]#w is used, critical rate is increased. When #y[Taunting Howl]#w is used, the skill user's own HP is deducted to increase the attack power.
#yDuration: {0} sec
Critical rate: +{1}%
{2}% of HP is used to increase Strength by {3}%
messages.1000085160: Bone Crash is enhanced. After striking down on the enemy, #yLeft Click#w to thrust enemies into the air.\n#yAdditional hit damage {0}%\n{1} Rage Point is added when Bone Crash EX is used.
messages.1000096254:
When #y[Whirlwind]#w and #y[Soccer Kick Combo]#w are used, #y[Circle Swing EX]#w changes to Instant for a while and can be used quickly and immediately. When #y[Soccer Kick Combo]#w hits the enemy, #y[Circle Swing]#w and Instant's cooldown is recovered by {0} sec.

#yOwn ATK increases by {1}%
Circle Swing shares cooldown with Instant
